title: Anyone 3DS friend codes???

replies.body: hai there, I used to LOVE hacking Pokemon x, and I have a couple of shinys if your interested, but I'm not giving away my shiny new, or my shiny dialga, anything else is yours, I'll let you have 1 Pokemon of you choice, but oFC if I accept it :) But I really have a lot of sjinys, here's my friend code: 0920-1217-2618 PS my mii looks nothing like me.oh yes if we battle... be prepared, I will use my non hacked team but boy, you better watch out, my tyranitar with assault vest or its mega evoulition is my sweeper, tehe
